plentry.pd: -1: Adaptive preference. The SDK automatically selects the optimal encoding type for encoding based on factors such as platform and device type.
0: Software coding preference. The SDK prefers software encoders for video encoding.

1: Hardware encoding preference. The SDK prefers a hardware encoder for video encoding. When the device does not support hardware encoding, the SDK automatically uses software encoding andreports the currently used videoencodertype through hwEncoderAccelerating in the callback.
